headline: How Analyst Praise For TJX (TJX) Highlights The Power Of Its Off‑Price “Treasure Hunt” Model
summary: In recent days, TJX Companies has attracted attention as multiple research firms and institutional investors highlighted its off-price retail model, strong in-store traffic, and consistent operating results, underscoring the business’s resilience during periods of economic uncertainty. An interesting angle is how TJX’s “treasure hunt” shopping experience and access to discounted branded merchandise are being credited with supporting stable same-store sales and earnings while many retailers...
